15881,"Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (Harry Potter, #2)",0439064864,9780439064866,,B019PIOJY0,ATVPDKIKX0DER,US,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1474169725l/15881._SX98_.jpg,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1474169725l/15881._SY75_.jpg,1999,6,2,Arthur A. Levine Books,eng,false,"Ever since Harry Potter had come home for the summer, the Dursleys had been so mean and hideous that all Harry wanted was to get back to the Hogwarts School for Witchcraft and Wizardry. But just as he’s packing his bags, Harry receives a warning from a strange impish creature who says that if Harry returns to Hogwarts, disaster will strike.

And strike it does. For in Harry’s second year at Hogwarts, fresh torments and horrors arise, including an outrageously stuck-up new professor and a spirit who haunts the girls’ bathroom. But then the real trouble begins – someone is turning Hogwarts students to stone. Could it be Draco Malfoy, a more poisonous rival than ever? Could it possible be Hagrid, whose mysterious past is finally told? Or could it be the one everyone at Hogwarts most suspects… Harry Potter himself!","{""id"":{""_"":""6231171"",""type"":""integer""},""books_count"":{""_"":""642"",""type"":""integer""},""best_book_id"":{""_"":""15881"",""type"":""integer""},""reviews_count"":{""_"":""3821406"",""type"":""integer""},""ratings_sum"":{""_"":""12336578"",""type"":""integer""},""ratings_count"":{""_"":""2787258"",""type"":""integer""},""text_reviews_count"":{""_"":""54018"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_year"":{""_"":""1998"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_month"":{""_"":""7"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_day"":{""_"":""2"",""type"":""integer""},""original_title"":""Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"",""original_language_id"":{""type"":""integer"",""nil"":""true""},""media_type"":""book"",""rating_dist"":""5:1647172|4:763749|3:307898|2:53589|1:14850|total:2787258"",""desc_user_id"":{""_"":""71271352"",""type"":""integer""},""default_chaptering_book_id"":{""_"":""15881"",""type"":""integer""},""default_description_language_code"":{""nil"":""true""},""work_uri"":""kca://work/amzn1.gr.work.v1.PjwTgn-_w5b0mY40RgNxdw""}",4.43,341,Hardcover,First American Edition,2532255,38880,https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/15881.Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets,https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/15881.Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets,"{""author"":[{""id"":""1077326"",""name"":""J.K.     Harry Potter

"",""description"":""

    Orphan Harry learns he is a wizard on his 11th birthday when Hagrid escorts him to magic-teaching Hogwarts School. As a baby, his mother's love protected him and vanquished the villain Voldemort, leaving the child famous as ""The Boy who Lived"". With his friends Hermione and Ron, Harry has to defeat the returned ""He Who Must Not Be Named"".

"",""note"":""

    Cursed Child is NOT a Primary Work. Boxsets ARE part of the series. However, the mini-shorts are NOT books by Goodreads standards, and should neither be added to this series nor to the database.
